title: can you get perma banned for leaving games?
body: hello community, i have recently been having internet issues and have been disconnecting from alot of games i play. in the last week ive disconnected from 3 games and cant rejoin them due to connection issues. will i get banned for this?

replies.body:
You wont get perma banned for only 3 games. You may get a warning / temp ban. Not really sure what the trigger is.

If you continue to have issues and leave a shit load of games i guess its possible to work your way through the banning tiers to a perma.
ok thank you for the help. so basically if you leave a game here and there it wont harm you?
As longs as it's not many and now too close together as far as i understand. I'm sure someone will post something more specific for you later on :^).

To expand on this, quantity and frequency are definitely factors, though the severity of each leave/dc is also factored in. Rogue has it fairly accurate, though, since you should *not* receive a perma-ban unless you've already been through the lower tier punishments (5-10-20 minute LPQs, followed by a 14 day ban) and/or in extreme cases (like leaving several consecutive games).

As far as I'm aware, the Leavebuster system only triggers when you have been DCed/AFK from a given match for 5+ minutes.
